    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Player class, a serializable object representation of each player in the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String _colour,
              boolean _isAlive,
              boolean _isKillable,
              boolean _isActive)
        Parametrised constructor for a Player object
        Parameters:
        _colour - A String containing the Hex value of the of the Color associated with the player
        _isAlive - A Boolean indicating whether a player is eligible to make a move
        _isKillable - A Boolean indicating if a player has made their first move
        _isActive - A Boolean indicating if a player has the current turn
